mean_en: the act of listening to, looking at or thinking about something/somebody carefully; interest that people show in somebody/something; things that somebody does to try to please you or to show their interest in you; special care, action or treatment
sentence: Only one student in the class was paying attention to what the teacher was saying.
sentence_trans: 班上只有一个学生在专心听老师讲课。
word_etyma: attent关注 + ion名词后缀 → attention注意力
